title: Before the Hurting Lands. (K-Rizzla Records Session)
lyrics:
I'm leaving you today
I'm packing all my years away
And I'm not even close
So I've got to go
Before
Before

Before the hurting lands

The hurting lands



I'm believing it will fade it away

As my pockets start to lose their weight

And I'm as light as a balloon

Rising high naming rivers on the moon

Before

Before

Before the hurting lands

The hurting lands
